sentences.en: He looked physically very powerful, athletic in a compact way.
sentences.cn: 他看上去非常强壮，像个敦实的运动员。

sentences.en: He suspiciously watched the men at the Athletic Club that noon.
sentences.cn: 那天中午,他心怀鬼胎地注意运动俱乐部的那些人.

sentences.en: He was tall, with an athletic build.
His body is wiry and athletic.
sentences.cn: 他长得清瘦而结实，体格健美。

sentences.en: In the Catholic cathedral, the athlete shouted out his wrath in the athletic oath.
sentences.cn: 在天主教大教堂，选手在体育誓言中喊出了他义愤。

sentences.en: John is an athletic boy. He is good at running.
sentences.cn: 约翰体魄健壮. 他擅长跑步.

sentences.en: Most athletic activities are about individual effort.
sentences.cn: 大多数体育项目是靠个人的拼搏。

sentences.en: Our school won the athletic sports because we have so many good sportsmen.
sentences.cn: 我们学校在运动方面取胜是因为我校有很多优秀的运动员.

sentences.en: The local club has disaffiliated from the National Athletic Association.
sentences.cn: 当地俱乐部已退出全国体育联合会。

sentences.en: The sports field is marked out for an athletic meeting.
sentences.cn: 准备开运动会的运动场地已被划好.

sentences.en: There are socks for special purposes: athletic socks, crew socks etc.
sentences.cn: 有一些短袜子有特殊的用途,如运动袜, 水手袜等.

sentences.en: They have been given college scholarships purely on athletic ability.
sentences.cn: 他们完全是凭体育特长才获得了大学奖学金。

sentences.en: This area has been marked off for athletic practice.
sentences.cn: 这块地方被划出来供体育训练之用.

sentences.en: Wade was a hearty, bluff, athletic sort of guy.
sentences.cn: 韦德是个精力充沛、率直、运动型的人。

sentences.en: Xandra is an athletic 36-year-old with a 21-year-old's body.
sentences.cn: 36岁的汉德拉身体健壮，有着21岁小伙子的体能。

words.tran_cn: 运动员，体育家；身强力壮的人
崇尚运动，竞技热；运动竞赛

trans.tran_cn: 运动的，田径运动的，运动员的，身体健壮的
trans.tran_en: physically strong and good at sport
